; Typical triggers for this widget: trigger ColumnHeader_LClicked throws params string pFieldName : in numeric pModifierKeys : in ; 0=None | 1=Shift | 2=Ctrl | 4=Alt endparams
selectcase pModifierKeys case 0 ; No modifier key pressed ; Your implementation here ... case 1 ; Shift key pressed ; Your implementation here ... case 2 ;- Control key pressed ; Your implementation here ... case 3 ;- Control + Shift key pressed ; Your implementation here ... case 4 ;- Alt key pressed ; Your implementation here ... case 5 ;- Alt + Shift key pressed ; Your implementation here ... case 6 ;- Alt + Control key pressed ; Your implementation here ... case 7 ;- Alt + Control + Shift key pressed ; Your implementation here ... endselectcase
end

end

trigger detail ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This trigger invokes the ^quit macro, which fires the quit operation. ; The quit operation should handle the request further after which the form is closed. ; OK and Cancel buttons are typically used on modal data entry forms.
macro "^quit"
end
Button to cancel action and close form

macro "^quit"
end

trigger detail ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This trigger clears the retrieved occurrences from the entity to be controlled by this button.
; TO DO: ; 1. Paint this field within the entity it needs to control or specify a literal entity name in code.
clear/e "<$entname>"
end

trigger detail throws ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This trigger clears the retrieved occurrences from the entity to be controlled by this button.
macro "^clear"
end

trigger detail ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This trigger invokes the ^quit macro, which fires the quit operation. ; The quit operation should handle the request further after which the form is closed. ; a Close button is typically used in non-forms or modal read-only forms.
macro "^quit"
end

trigger detail throws ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This trigger invokes the ^quit macro, which fires the quit operation. ; The quit operation should handle the request further, after which the form is closed. ; A Close button is typically used in non-modal forms or modal read-only forms.
macro "^quit"
end

trigger detail ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This trigger creates a new occurrence after the current occurrence of the entity to be controlled by this button.
; TO DO: ; 1. Paint this field within the entity it needs to control.
creocc "<$entname>", $curocc("<$entname>") ; Insert code to generate any technical keys, e.g. ; KEYFIELD.<$entname> = $uuid
end

end

trigger detail throws ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This trigger invokes the ^accept macro, which fires the accept operation. ; The accept operation should handle the request further, after which the form is closed. ; OK and Cancel buttons are typically used on modal data entry forms.

trigger detail ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This triggers marks the current occurrence of the entity to be controlled by this button for deletion; ; actual deletion occurs on store.
; TO DO: ; 1. Paint this field within the entity it needs to control or specify a literal entity name in code.
remocc "<$entname>", 0
end
Button to mark occurrence for deletion

trigger detail throws ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; The remocc command marks the current occurrence of the entity controlled by this button for deletion ; actual deletion occurs upon store.
; TO DO: ; 1. Draw this field within the entity it needs to control, or specify a literal entity name in code.
remocc "<$entname>", 0
end

trigger detail ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This triggers marks the current occurrence of the entity to be controlled by this button for deletion; ; actual deletion occurs on store.
; TO DO: ; 1. Paint this field within the entity it needs to control or specify a literal entity name in code.
; Retrieves data from database and loads them as occurrences in the current entity. variables string vProfiles endvariables
; Optionally copy single occurrence from a dedicated profile entity to be used as profile ; clear/e "<$entname>" ; putlistitems/occ vProfiles, "PROFILE_ENTITY" ; getlistitems/occ/init vProfiles, "<$entname>"
retrieve/e "<$entname>" selectcase $procerror case 0 ; ok case -2, -4 message/info "Retrieve: No data found in the database." elsecase message/error "Retrieve: Error occurred - (%%($procerror))." endselectcase
return 0
end
Button to retrieve data from database

trigger detail throws ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This trigger marks the current occurrence of the entity controlled by this button for retrieval
; TO DO: ; 1. Paint this field within the entity it needs to control, or specify a literal entity name in code.
variables string vProfiles endvariables
#ifdefined option_1 ; Optionally copy a single occurrence from another entity to be used as profile input clear/e "<$entname>" putlistitems/occ vProfiles, "PROFILE_ENTITY" getlistitems/occ/init vProfiles, "<$entname>" #endif
; Retrieve data from DBMS using current occurrence as profile try retrieve message "Retrieve successful" catch <UIOSERR_OCC_NOT_FOUND>, <UIOSERR_OPEN_FAILURE> ; -2, -4 message "Retrieve failed - No data found in the database." endtry
end

trigger detail ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This trigger stores occurrences that are modified into the database and ; deletes any occurrences marked for deletion from the database.
; TO DO: ; 1. Paint this field within the entity it needs to control or specify a literal entity name in code. ; 2. Define a constant DATAERRORS at component with the name of the struct variable that will hold data validation errors
variables numeric vProcError endvariables
; Store entity store/e "<$entname>" selectcase $procerror case 0 ; no store errors selectcase $status case 1 ; no modifications message/info "No modifications." case 0 ; store successful commit selectcase $procerror case 0 ; store and commit successful message/info "Store successful." elsecase ; commit error message/info "Commit failed ($procerror=%%($procerror))." endselectcase endselectcase elsecase ; store failed vProcError = $procerror
; rollback rollback selectcase $procerror case 0 ; rollback successful message/error "Store failed ($procerror=%%(vProcError)) - transaction rolled back." elsecase ; rollback error message/error "Store failed ($procerror=%%(vProcError)) - Rollback failed ($procerror=%%($procerror))." endselectcase return vProcError endselectcase
return 0
end
Button to save data to database

trigger detail throws ; Pressing this button fires this trigger. ; This trigger stores occurrences that are modified into the database and ; deletes any occurrences marked for deletion from the database.
; TO DO: ; 1. Draw this field within the entity it needs to control, or specify a literal entity name in code. ; 2. Define a constant DATAERRORS at component with the name of the struct variable that will hold data validation errors
variables string vProcErrorContext endvariables
; Validate data before store to separate validation errors from store errors ; Validation errors are reported back to the data and will be shown by the DSP web client try validate try store if ($status == 1) message "No modifications made or entity read-only" else commit message "Store successful." endif catch vProcErrorContext = $procerrorcontext rollback throw $item("ERROR", vProcErrorContext), "Rethrow", vProcErrorContext endtry catch <UGENERR_4GL_SAYS_ERROR>, <UVALERR_SYNTAX>, <UVALERR_CONSTRAINT>, <UVALERR_KEY_PROFILE>, <UVALERR_KEY_EMPTY> ; Validation errors are already reported by the error trigger -> ignore endtry
end

trigger representationChanged ; Only works if tree widget property INLINEEDIT=TRUE params string itemValue: in string control: in ; TREE | LIST string newRepresentation: in endparams variables string treeItem, listUpdate endvariables
getitem/id treeItem, $valrep, itemValue putitem treeItem, 3, newRepresentation ; Change representation listUpdate = "0=" ; Indicate partial valrep update putitem/id listUpdate, itemValue, treeItem $valrep = listUpdate
end ; trigger representationChanged

end
